464:1: bhūtapūrva bhikṣavo'tīte'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairvipulairaprameyairacintyairaparimitairapramāṇaistataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa yadāsīt-tena kālena tena samayena mahābhijñājñānābhibhūrnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstāḥ devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān saṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau mahārūpe kalpe|
464:3: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavo yāvāniha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
464:6: atha khalu sa puruṣastasmāllokadhātorekaṃ paramāṇurajo gṛhītvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi lokadhātusahasramatikramya tadekaṃ paramāṇuraja upanikṣipet|
464:7: atha sa puruṣo dvitīyaṃ ca paramāṇurajo gṛhītvā tataḥ pareṇa parataraṃ lokadhātusahasramatikramya dvitīyaṃ paramāṇuraja upanikṣipet|
464:8: anena paryāyeṇa sa puruṣaḥ sarvāvantaṃ pṛthivīdhātumupanikṣipet pūrvasyāṃ diśi|
464:9: tatkiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ śakyaṃ teṣāṃ lokadhātūnāmanto vā paryanto vā gaṇanayādhigantum?
464:12: bhagavānāha-śakyaṃ punarbhikṣavasteṣāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ kenacid gaṇakena vā gaṇakamahāmātreṇa vā gaṇanayā paryanto'dhigantum,
464:15: na tveva teṣāṃ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śakyaṃ gaṇanāyogena paryanto'dhigantum|
464:19: taṃ cāhaṃ bhikṣavastathāgataṃ tāvacciraṃ parinirvṛtamanena tathāgatajñānadarśanabalādhānena yathādya śvo vā parinirvṛtamanusmarāmi||
464:20: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
464:29: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pi ca eva nikṣipet
464:30: sarvaṃ pi so nikṣipi taṃ rajogatam|
464:44: smarāmi vṛttaṃ yatha adya śvo vā||6||
464:50: pūrve ca sa bhagavān mahābhijñānābhibhūstathāgato'nabhisaṃbuddho'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ bodhimaṇḍavarāgragrata eva sarvāṃ mārasenāṃ prābhañjīt parājaiṣīt|
464:51: prabhañjayitvā parājayitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyāmiti na ca tāvattasya te dharmā āmukhībhavanti sma|
464:55: tṛtīyamapi caturthamapi pañcamamapi ṣaṣṭhamapi saptamamapi aṣṭamamapi navamamapi daśamamapyantarakalpaṃ bodhivṛkṣamūle bodhimaṇḍe'sthāt sakṛdvartanena paryaṅkena antarādavyutthitaḥ|
464:57: na ca tāvadasya te dharmā āmukhībhavanti sma||
464:58: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavo bhagavato bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatasya devaistrāyastriṃśairmahāsiṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūd yojanaśatasahasraṃ samucchrayeṇa,
464:59: yatra sa bhagavān niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ|
464:60: samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya ca khalu punastasya bhagavato bodhimaṇḍe,
464:62: bodhimaṇḍasya parisāmantakena yojanaśatamantarikṣe ca vātān pramuñcanti,
464:64: yathāpravarṣitaṃ ca tat puṣpavarṣaṃ tasya bhagavato bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya avyucchinnaṃ pravarṣayanti|
464:66: tathā pravarṣitaṃ ca tatpuṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣayanti yāvat parinirvāṇakālasamaye tasya bhagavatastaṃ bhagavantamabhyavakiranti|
464:68: tasya bhagavato bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatasya satkārārthamavyucchinnaṃ pravādayāmāsuḥ paripūrṇān daśāntarakalpān tasya bhagavato niṣaṇṇasya|
464:69: tata uttari tāni divyāṇi tūryāṇi satatasamitaṃ pravādayāmāsuryāvattasya bhagavato mahāparinirvāṇakālasamayāt||
464:70: atha khalu bhikṣavo daśānāmantarakalpānāmatyayena sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ|
464:71: samanantarābhisaṃbuddhaṃ ca taṃ viditvā ye tasya bhagavataḥ kumārabhūtasya ṣoḍaśa putrā abhūvannaurasāḥ,
464:73: teṣāṃ ca khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśānāṃ rājakumārāṇāmekaikasya ca vividhāni krīḍanakāni rāmaṇīyakānyabhūvan vicitrāṇi darśanīyāni|
464:74: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāstāni vividhāni krīḍanakāni rāmaṇīyakāni visarjayitvā,
464:75: taṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaṃ viditvā,
464:76: mātṛbhirdhātrībhiśca rudantībhiḥ parivṛtāḥ puraskṛtāḥ tena ca mahārājñā cakravartinā āryakeṇa mahākośena rājāmātyaiśca bahubhiśca prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtāḥ puraskṛtāḥ yena bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhimaṇḍavarāgragataḥ,
464:78: tasya bhagavataḥ satkārārthāya gurukārārthāya mānanārthāya pūjanārthāya arcanārthāya apacāyanārthāya upasaṃkrāntāḥ|
464:79: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirvanditvā taṃ bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇīkṛtya añjaliṃ pragṛhya taṃ bhagavantaṃ saṃmukhamābhirgāthābhiḥ sārūpyābhirabhiṣṭuvanti sma—
464:86: na ca te'ntarā kāyu kadāci cālito
464:107: śaraṇaṃ ca tvā eti vrajāma nātha||14||
464:108: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāḥ kumārabhūtā eva bālakāḥ,
464:109: taṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhimukhaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamābhiḥ sārūpyabhīrgāthābhiḥ saṃmukhamabhiṣṭutya taṃ bhagavantamadhyeṣante sma dharmacakrapravartanatāyai-deśayatu bhagavān dharmam,
464:110: deśayatu sugato dharmaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca|
464:120: caryāṃ ca jñānaṃ pi ca sarva jānasi
464:124: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tena bhagavatā mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyamānena daśasu dikṣvaikaikasyāṃ diśi pañcāśallokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitānyabhūīvan,
464:126: sarveṣu ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu yā lokāntarikāstāsu ye akṣaṇāḥ saṃvṛtā andhakāratamisrāḥ yatra imāvapi candrasūryau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau evaṃmahaujaskau ābhayāpyābhāṃ nānubhavataḥ,
464:130: te'pyanyonyamevaṃ paśyanti anyonyamevaṃ saṃjānanti-anye'pi bata bhoḥ sattvāḥ santīhopapannāḥ|
464:131: anye'pi bata bhoḥ sattvāḥ santīhopapannāḥ iti|
464:132: sarveṣu ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu yāni devabhavanāni devavimānāni ca,
464:134: mahatā cāvabhāsena sphuṭānyabhūvan atikramya devānāṃ devānubhāvam|
464:135: iti hi bhikṣavastasmin samaye teṣu lokadhātuṣu mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya mahataśca audārikasyāvabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvo'bhūt||
464:136: atha pūrvasyāṃ diśi teṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu yāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni,
464:139: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣāṃ mahābrahmaṇāmetadabhavat-imāni khalu punarbrāhmāṇi vimānānyatīva bhrājanti tapanti virājanti śrīmanti aujasvīni ca|
464:141: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye mahābrahmāṇaḥ,
464:143: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sarvasattvatrātā nāma mahābrahmā taṃ mahāntaṃ brahmagaṇaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata—
464:156: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye mahābrahmāṇaḥ,
464:157: te sarve sahitāḥ samagrāstāni divyāni svāni svāni brāhmāṇi vimānānyabhiruhya divyāṃśca sumerumātrān puṣpapuṭān gṛhītvā catasṛṣu dikṣvanucaṃkramanto'nuvicarantaḥ paścimaṃ digbhāgaṃ prakrāntāḥ|
464:158: adrākṣuḥ khalu punasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu bhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇaḥ paścime digbhāge taṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bodhimaṇḍavarāgragataṃ bodhivṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ parivṛtaṃ puraskṛtaṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragarūḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyaiḥ,
464:161: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirvanditvā taṃ bhagavantamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya taiśca sumerumātraiḥ puṣpapuṭaistaṃ bhagavantamabhyavakiranti sma,
464:164: abhyavakīrya tāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni tasya bhagavato niryātayāmāsuḥ-parigṛhṇātu bhagavānimāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni asmākamanukampāmupādāya|
464:166: atha khalu bhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇastāni svāni svāni vimānāni tasya bhagavato niryātya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ saṃmukhamābhirgāthābhiḥ sārūpyābhirabhiṣṭuvanti sma—
464:179: atha khalu bhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānabhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ saṃmukhamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya taṃ bhagavantametadūcuḥ-pravartayatu bhagavān dharmacakram,
464:184: deśayatu bhagavān dharmasvāmī dharmamasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ|
464:185: tad bhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca||
464:186: atha khalu bhikṣavastāni pañcāśad brahmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyekasvareṇa samasaṃgītyā taṃ bhagavantamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣanta—
464:191: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ mahābrahmaṇāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsayati sma||
464:192: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena pūrvadakṣiṇe digbhāge teṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu yāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni,
464:193: tānyatīva bhrājanti tapanti virājanti śrīmanti ojasvīni ca|
464:194: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣāṃ brahmaṇāmetadabhavat-imāni khalu punarbrāhmāṇi vimānānyatīva bhrājanti tapanti virājanti śrīmanti ojasvīni ca|

464:212: dṛṣṭvā ca punaryena sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastenopasaṃkrantāḥ|

464:312: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣāṃ mahābrahmaṇāmetadabhavat-imāni khalu punarbrāhmāṇi vimānānyatīva bhrājanti tapanti virājanti śrīmanti ojasvīni ca|
464:314: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye mahābrahmāṇaḥ,
464:316: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ śikhī nāma mahābrahmā taṃ mahāntaṃ brahmagaṇaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata—
464:322: śrutaṃ ca keno tatha pūrva āsīt|
464:328: yadi vā bhaved buddha kadāci loke||46||
464:329: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye mahābrahmāṇaḥ,
464:330: te sarve sahitāḥ samagrāstāni divyāni svāni svāni brāhmāṇi vimānānyabhiruhya divyāṃśca sumerumātrān puṣpapuṭān gṛhītvā catasṛṣu dikṣvanucaṃkramanto'nuvicaranto yena adhodigbhāgastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ|
464:331: adrākṣuḥ khalu punarbhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇo'dhodigbhāge taṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bodhimaṇḍavarāgragataṃ bodhivṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ parivṛtaṃ puraskṛtaṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragarūḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyaiḥ,
464:334: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirvanditvā taṃ bhagavantamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya taiḥ sumerumātraiḥ puṣpapuṭaistaṃ bhagavantamabhyavakiranti sma,
464:335: abhiprakiranti sma taṃ ca bodhivṛkṣaṃ daśayojanapramāṇam|
464:336: abhyavakīrya tāni divyāni svāni svāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni tasya bhagavato niryātayāmāsuḥ-pratigṛhṇātu bhagavānimāni brāhmāṇi vimānānyasmākamanukampāmupādāya|
464:338: atha khalu bhikṣavaste'pi mahābrahmāṇastāni svāni svāni vimānāni tasya bhagavato niryātya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ saṃmukhamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭuvanti sma—
464:340: tradhātukasmi buddhā vai sattvānāṃ ye pramocakāḥ||47||
464:343: śūnyā acintiyāḥ kalpā atītāḥ pūrvi ye abhū|
464:347: divyāḥ kāyāśca hīyante cyutā gacchanti durgatim|
464:348: aśrutvā dharma buddhānāṃ gatyeṣāṃ bhoti pāpikā||51||
464:350: sukhaṃ vinaśyatī teṣāṃ sukhasaṃjñā ca naśyati||52||
464:360: vayaṃ ca sarvasattvāśca agrāṃ bodhiṃ spṛśemahi||57||
464:361: atha khalu bhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ saṃmukhamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya taṃ bhagavantametadūcuḥ-pravartayatu bhagavān dharmacakram|
464:367: dharmamasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ|
464:368: tadbhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokanukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca||
464:369: atha khalu bhikṣavastāni pañcāśad brahmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyekasvareṇa samasaṃgītyā taṃ bhagavantamābhyāṃ sārūpyābhyāṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣanta—
464:378: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ brahmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmadhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā teṣāṃ ca ṣoḍaśānāṃ putrāṇāṃ rājakumārāṇām,
464:379: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmāsa triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāramapravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā anyena vā kenacit punarloke saha dharmeṇa|
464:384: pratītyasamutpādapravṛttiṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayāmāsa-iti hi bhikṣavo'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ,
464:394: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati|
464:406: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati||
464:407: sahapravartitaṃ cedaṃ bhikṣavastena bhagavatā mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena dharmacakraṃ sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ parṣadaḥ purastāt,
464:408: atha tasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte ṣaṣṭeḥ prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni|
464:409: sarve ca te traividyāḥ ṣaḍabhijñā aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyinaḥ saṃvṛttāḥ|
464:410: punaranupūrveṇa bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dvitīyāṃ dharmadeśanāmakārṣīt,
464:413: atha khalu bhikṣavastasya bhagavato mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaikaikasyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni|
464:414: tataḥ paścād bhikṣavastasya bhagavato gaṇanāsamatikrāntaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho'bhūt||
464:415: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena te ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāḥ kumārabhūtā eva samānāḥ śraddhayā agārādanāgārikāṃ pravrajitāḥ|
464:416: sarve ca te śrāmaṇerā abhūvan paṇḍitā vyaktā medhāvinaḥ kuśalā bahubuddhaśatasahasracaritāvino'rthinaścānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ|
464:417: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadūcuḥ-imāni khalu punarbhagavaṃstathāgatasya bahūni śrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi maharddhikāni mahānubhāvāni maheśākhyāni bhagavato dharmadeśanayā pariniṣpannāni|
464:418: tat sādhu bhagavāṃstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho'smākamanukampāmupādāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya dharmaṃ deśayatu,
464:422: tvaṃ ca bhagavan sarvasattvāśayajño jānīṣe asmākamadhyāśayamiti||
464:423: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tān bālān dārakān rājakumārān pravrajitān śrāmaṇerān dṛṣṭvā yāvāṃstasya rājñaścakravartinaḥ parivāraḥ,
464:425: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ śrāmaṇerāṇāmadhyāśayaṃ viditvā viṃśateḥ kalpasahasrāṇāmatyayena saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayāmāsa tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām||
464:426: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tasya bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ te ṣodaśa rājakumārāḥ śrāmaṇerā udgṛhītavanto dhāritavanta ārādhitavantaḥ paryāptavantaḥ||
464:427: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastān ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerān vyākārṣīdanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
464:428: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavo mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyemaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya śrāvakāścādhimuktavantaḥ|
464:429: te ca ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerā bahūni ca prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi vicikitsāprāptānyabhūvan||
464:430: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyamaṣṭau kalpasahasrāṇyaviśrānto bhāṣitvā vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ pratisaṃlayanāya|
464:431: tathā pratisaṃlīnaśca bhikṣavaḥ sa tathāgataścaturaśītikalpasahasrāṇi vihārasthita evāsīt||
464:432: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgataṃ pratisaṃlīnaṃ viditvā pṛthak pṛthag dharmāsanāni siṃhāsanāni prajñāpya teṣu niṣaṇṇāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgataṃ namaskṛtya taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ vistareṇa catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ caturaśītikalpasahasrāṇi saṃprakāśitavantaḥ|
464:433: tatra bhikṣava ekaikaḥ śrāmaṇero bodhisattvaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavān samādāpitavān saṃharṣitavān samuttejitavān saṃpraharṣitavānavatāritavān||
464:434: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ caturaśīteḥ kalpasahasrāṇāmatyayena smṛtimān saṃprajānastasmāt samādhervyuttiṣṭhat|
464:435: vyutthāya ca sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato yena taddharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat|
464:437: samanantaraniṣaṇṇaśca khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgatastasmin dharmāsane,
464:438: atha tāvadeva sarvāvantaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayāmāsaāścaryaprāptā bhikṣavo'dbhutaprāptā ime ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāḥ prajñāvanto bahubuddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraparyupāsitāścīrṇacaritā buddhajñānaparyupāsakā buddhajñānapratigrāhakā buddhājñānāvatārakā buddhajñānasaṃdarśakāḥ|
464:439: paryupāsadhvaṃ bhikṣava etān ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerān punaḥ punaḥ|
464:440: ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā bodhisattvayānikā vā eṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ na pratikṣepsyanti|
464:444: tai khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kulaputraistasya bhagavataḥ śāsane'yaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃprakāśito'bhūt|
464:445: taiḥ khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāmaṇerairbodhisattvairmahāsattvairyāni tānyekaikena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bodhāya samādāpitānyabhūvan,
464:446: sarvāṇi ca tāni taireva sārdhaṃ tāsu tāsu jātiṣvanupravrajitāni|
464:452: ye te ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāḥ kumārabhūtā ye tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane śrāmaṇerā dharmabhāṇakā abhūvan,
464:454: sarve ca ta etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti|
464:455: daśasu dikṣu nānābuddhakṣetreṣu bahūnāṃ śrāvakabodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti|
464:456: yaduta pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo'bhiratyāṃ lokadhātāvakṣobhyo nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho merukūṭaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ|
464:457: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ siṃhaghoṣaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ siṃhadhvajaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ|
464:458: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ ākāśapratiṣṭhitaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nityaparinirvṛtaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ|
464:459: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi bhikṣava indradhvajaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho brahmadhvajaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ|
464:460: paścimāyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo'mitāyuśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvalokadhātūpadravodvegapratyuttīrṇaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ|
464:461: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavastamālapatracandanagandhābhijñaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho merukalpaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ|
464:462: uttarasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo meghasvaradīpaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho meghasvararājaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ|
464:463: uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ sarvalokabhayacchambhitatvavidhvaṃsanarakaraśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ|
464:464: ahaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ṣoḍaśamo madhye khalvasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ||
464:465: ye punaste bhikṣavastadā asmākaṃ śrāmaṇerabhūtānāṃ sattvāṃ dharmaṃ śrutavantaḥ tasya bhagavataḥ śāsana ekaikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yānyasmābhiḥ samādāpitānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
464:472: ye mayā bodhisattvena tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvajñatādharmamanuśrāvitāni?
464:473: yūyaṃ te bhikṣavastena kālena tena samayena sattvā abhūvan||
464:474: ye ca mama parinirvṛtasya anāgate'dhvani śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti,
464:477: kiṃcāpi te bhikṣavaḥ sarve parinirvāṇasaṃjñinaḥ parinirvāsyanti,
464:478: api tu khalu punarbhikṣavo yadahamanyāsu lokadhātuṣvanyonyairnāmadheyairviharāmi,
464:480: tatra ca te punarevaitāṃ kriyāṃ śroṣyanti|
464:484: yasmin bhikṣavaḥ samaye tathāgataḥ parinirvāṇakālasamayamātmanaḥ samanupaśyati,
464:485: pariśuddhaṃ ca parṣadaṃ paśyati adhimuktisārāṃ śūnyadharmagatiṃ gatāṃ dhyānavatīṃ mahādhyānavatīm,
464:486: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato'yaṃ kāla iti viditvā sarvān bodhisattvān sarvaśrāvakāṃśca saṃnipātya paścādetamarthaṃ saṃśrāvayati|
464:487: na bhikṣavaḥ kiṃcidasti loke dvitīyaṃ nāma yānaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vā,
464:489: upāyakauśalyaṃ khalvidaṃ bhikṣavastathāgatānāmarhatām-dūrapranaṣṭaṃ sattvadhātuṃ viditvā hīnābhiratān kāmapaṅkamagnān,
464:491: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣava iha syāt pañcayojanaśatikamaṭavīkāntāram|
464:492: mahāṃścātra janakāyaḥ pratipanno bhaved ratnadīpaṃ gamanāya|
464:493: deśikaścaiṣāmeko bhaved vyaktaḥ paṇḍito nipuṇo medhāvī kuśalaḥ khalvaṭavīdurgāṇām|
464:495: atha khalu sa mahājanakāyaḥ śrāntaḥ klānto bhītastrastaḥ evaṃ vadet- yat khalvārya deśika pariṇāyaka jānīyāḥ-vayaṃ hi śrāntāḥ klāntā bhītāstrastā anirvṛtāḥ|
464:498: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa deśika upāyakuśalastān puruṣān pratinivartitukāmān viditvā evaṃ cintayet-mā khalvime tapasvinastādṛśaṃ mahāratnadvīpaṃ na gaccheyuriti|
464:500: tasyā aṭavyā madhye yojanaśataṃ vā dviyojanaśataṃ vā triyojanaśataṃ vā atikramya ṛddhimayaṃ nagaramabhinirmimīyāt|
464:501: tatastān puruṣānevaṃ vadet- mā bhavanto bhaiṣṭa,
464:505: atra vo yāni kānicit karaṇīyāni tāni sarvāṇi kurudhvam|
464:509: atha khalu bhikṣavaste kāntāraprāptāḥ sattvā āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā bhaveyuḥ-muktā vayamaṭavīkāntārāt|
464:511: atha khalu bhikṣavaste puruṣāstadṛddhimayaṃ nagaraṃ praviśeyuḥ,
464:515: tatastān deśiko viśrāntān viditvā tadṛddhimayaṃ nagaramantardhāpayet|
464:516: antardhāpayitvā ca tān puruṣānevaṃ vadet-āgacchantu bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ|
464:518: idaṃ tu mayā nagaraṃ yuṣmākaṃ viśrāmaṇārthamabhinirmitamiti||
464:519: evameva bhikṣavastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yuṣmākaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca deśikaḥ|
464:520: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha evaṃ paśyati-mahadidaṃ kleśakāntāraṃ nirgantavyaṃ niṣkrāntavyaṃ prahātavyam|
464:521: mā khalvime ekameva buddhajñānaṃ śrutvā draveṇaiva pratinivartayeyuḥ,
464:524: tatra tathāgataḥ sattvān durbalāśayān viditvā yathā sa deśikastadṛddhimayaṃ nagaramabhinirmitīte teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ viśrāmaṇārtham,
464:525: viśrāntānāṃ caiṣāmevaṃ kathayati-idaṃ khalu ṛddhimayaṃ nagaramiti,
464:526: evameva bhikṣavastathāgato'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho mahopāyakauśalyena antarā dve nirvāṇabhūmī sattvānāṃ viśrāmaṇārthaṃ deśayati saṃprakāśayati yadidaṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ ca|
464:527: yasmiṃśca bhikṣavaḥ samaye te sattvāstatra sthitā bhavanti,
464:528: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato'pyevaṃ saṃśrāvayati-na khalu punarbhikṣavo yūyaṃ kṛtakṛtyāḥ kṛtakaraṇīyāḥ|
464:532: api tu khalu punarūpāyakauśalyametad bhikṣavastathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yat trīṇi yānāni saṃprakāśayantīti||
464:533: atha khalu bhagavānimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayopadarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
464:573: na tāva kālo mama dharma bhāṣitum||69||
464:612: ime ca sattvā bhavi sarvi eva
464:614: so cā jino āṃśayu jñātva teṣāṃ
464:659: dayaṃ pratyayo yena hu dharma bhāṣe|
464:668: aṭavī ca sā śūnya bhaveta dīrghā
464:714: samaye yadā tu sthita atra sthāne
464:727: daśo balā ye ca jināna dharmāḥ|
